alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Wendover, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
